SELECT c.*, prdc.* FROM cart c JOIN (SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.img1, p.max_account FROM product p JOIN store s ON p.store_code = s.store_code) prdc ON c.product_code = prdc.product_code WHERE cart_code = #{cart_code}

SELECT c.*, prdc.* FROM cart c JOIN (SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.img1, p.max_account FROM product p JOIN store s ON p.store_code = s.store_code) prdc ON c.product_code = prdc.product_code WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND bundle_code = #{bundle_code} AND states = '장바구니'
SELECT Ifnull(Max(order_code), 0) AS order_code FROM order_info WHERE LEFT(order_code, 6) = Date_format(Curdate(), '%y%m%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_info (order_code, user_id, bundle_code, store_code, ordr_date, rcv_zip, rcv_name, rcv_phone, rcv_addr1, rcv_addr2, rcv_msg, pay_method, delivery_fee, point, cal_check, reservation, reduce_point, add_point) VALUES ( #{order_code}, #{user_id}, #{bundle_code}, #{store_code}, Now(), #{rcv_zip}, #{rcv_name}, #{rcv_phone}, #{rcv_addr1}, #{rcv_addr2}, #{rcv_msg}, #{pay_method}, #{delivery_fee}, #{point}, 'N', #{reservation}, #{reduce_point}, #{add_point})
